website_summaries.verdict: Logitech's unique Fold-Up Keyboard for iPad 2 seems perfect for an executive desk, turning an iPad into a miniworkstation with eye-opening elegance. It's a shame the keyboard doesn't work as magnificently.
pros: The clever Logitech Fold-Up Keyboard for iPad 2 butterflies into a keyboard-stand combo with one deft motion, activating Bluetooth pairing automatically
It works with magnetic Smart Covers, too
cons: The plastic keyboard feels flimsier than other Logitech iPad keyboards, and the case is thick when folded up

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an iPad case that was the total package when connected, making it into a laptop replacement, and this case more than satisfies that requirement. I love the full-size keyboard and the fact that because the two when joined are rather heavy, I can easily strip the iPad right out of it for regular usage. Also, I received this january 20th, and with only occasional use (which is what I intended it for), have only charged it once right after I got it. Still on its first charge cycle and it now April 28!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine at first. From time to time we have trouble getting the keyboard to make contact with the screen to be able to type. Someone told us it was something that WE did though. Wish I new what that was so we wouldn't have that problem anymore. Over all we are happy. I'm sure its just an "operator" problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sandybell

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Only last about 10 minutes and then it dies unless you plug it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rony R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, with Caveats
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it makes the iPad a bit heavy, but that wasn't my complaint. Yes, it's a bit hard to get the 3rd gen. iPad out of the bracket, but that's okay. I only put it in if I'm going to be doing significant typing. My only real gripe is that the right-hand space bar is temperamental. If I don't hit it just right it either doesn't insert a space, or inserts 2. Why didn't I return it? Because this was the second one I bought and the first one usually couldn't make the blue tooth connection. I didn't want to return another one.
customer_reviews.author: Corpsecorps

customer_reviews.title: Works for iPad 3
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. I would buy it again. Keyboard feels great not as flimsy as people say. Just be a little gentle with it when you're opening the keyboard. It's a great product. I would buy it again. Keyboard feels great not as flimsiest people say. Just be a little gentle with it when you're opening the keyboard. Charge last for a long time. Worth it
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My Husband loves it.  Lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered was broken. It never turned on even after being plugged in for a few hours. I returned it and ordered another one and this one worked great. My husband loves this. His first one lasted years before he dropped it and it cracked but still worked.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: While I thought I was buying separate keyboard, this turned out to be a tray the iPad fits in that has a swingout keyboard built into it. I tried using it and it worked, but the combination was heavier than my laptop, so it was rather pointless. I have set it aside and am not likely to use it much.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ells

customer_reviews.title: makes a great product even better
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty old-school. I learned to type on manual typewriters, long before computers shrank down from room-sized behemoths into something you could slip into a book bag ... and still have room for some books! The keyboard is comfortable and has good tactile feedback, and the keys are large enough for even my rather over-sized digits. The keyboard folds up into a slim package on the back of the iPad, so that with a Smart Cover on the front, my iPad is protected from blows from all directions. I wish more iPad keyboard cases copied that idea of protecting the back and letting the outstanding Smart Cover do its stuff protecting the front.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE CAINE

customer_reviews.title: ... and after 3 years this thing is still running like a champ
customer_reviews.text: At the time this was a hot product and after 3 years this thing is still running like a champ. Wish the company made a model for the current iPad. Only down side is that this thing can not handle a fall. You might get away with one or two accidental drops, but after that things will break, and the will break in expected areas. So as long as you are careful you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G. McDougle

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Adds quite a bit of weight and bulk to ipad, however the large keyboard is very comfortable to work on, pairing was easy, and battery life is very good. Unfortunately, for me the extra weight and bulk it added to my ipad outweighed its pros...I'm back to searching for the perfect lightweight compact bluetooth travel keyboard - that is not a case or cover for my ipad.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: I love the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments on the keyboard from clients and colleges. The only issue it has is that sometimes I have to slam it together before it will turn on and I don't want to break it, so you may want to correct that issue so it works easy for others.
customer_reviews.author: Brokerrealtor

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: I take my ipad and type notes on it and i email myself the notes or store them in my google drive instead of taking my laptop. It is more convenient than taking my ipad. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: BHoward

customer_reviews.title: Good idea.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return mine because it would not fit my iPad 3, because of the slight extra thickness of the new version. But the idea is great, and I wish I had been able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Retractable Cover / Keyboard (iPad)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one as the previous cover was mistakenly damaged. It serves most purposes though one would have to take the iPad out of the cover in order to shoot pictures, albeit taking it out is a mission in itself. The only suggestion would be to have a USB console to use a mouse on the keyboard, if that could be possible.
customer_reviews.author: oupa hlatshwayo

customer_reviews.title: nice keyboard but almost no battery life after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: if I had reviewed this the week I bought it, I would have given it 5 stars. But after 6 months - it works only when it's plugged in, or 10 minutes after you unplug it. The battery is just not good enough. Sad but true.
customer_reviews.author: Transplanted Newfie

customer_reviews.title: It also matches up well with the iPad and looks like it was designed as OEM
customer_reviews.text: This review was typed with a competing product. While the product functions well, it is bulky and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard, can be used as a stand and when ready to be stored it folds and is no larger than ipad
customer_reviews.author: Yosemite Sam

customer_reviews.title: i am glad i got it
customer_reviews.text: I am still enjoying my ipad keyboard, i am glad i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: And by break I mean the keys stopped registering. For a product I spent a pretty penny on, I was sorely disappointed. But when it was working, it was very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kjlacky

customer_reviews.title: Logitech fold-up keyboard case
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and works well, but is a bit heavy and a little bulky when it cones to traveling on a plane. It would be a great asset for school users as it makes the IPad 2 a convient mini desktop learning device.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Everything I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my new IPad and fold-up Keyboard. It is everything I thought it would be and more. It has opened up a new world for me. I am a senior citizen and sometimes high tech stuff turns me off, but this is so easy I am able to learn new things quickly. Glad to be aboard.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Poole

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Product didn’t work past the first day. Won’t charge. Annoyed I kept putting off the return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard keys were a problem
customer_reviews.text: 7-8 keys would not work. Otherwise the design is very creative and protective of the back of the Ipad, though a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Broke and No long Made by Logitech
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this item. Unfortunatly the keyboard quit working and I tried to warrenty it. Logitech says they no longer manufacture it and are issueing me a refund. Disapointed as it did work great...until it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kabuki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! My son loves the full size keyboard and uses this all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good full sized keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Great full sized keyboard. It does add weight and thickness but also helps protect the iPad . This is my second one. The edges that hold it to the iPad broke after 1 year but I liked it so much I ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Two of the keys didn't work right out of the box. Really disappointing as you can't find these through the logitech store anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Keil

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great! This is such a practical and useful accessory for the iPad. It is great for meetings and seminars too!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't turn on all the time.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't turn on all the time. Maybe you should switch to a more direct power switch for this keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and functions, but the clip area broke so now it won't hold it.
customer_reviews.author: lum90

customer_reviews.title: Logitech well done!
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up for Logitech, quality is excellent, nice to have a full size key board. Definitely adds weight but worth it, just wish it came with it's own hard cover.
customer_reviews.author: smart e-shopper

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I found this rather difficult to set up and once I did set it up I still found the keyboard difficult to use as it was so cramped
customer_reviews.author: Dan Wooding

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is absolutely the best in the market right now! It fits my iPad really well and it looks awesome, it connects automatically and its very responsive..... And the battery is GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: very good function, I can type a lot faster than onscreen keyboard. But I wish it would be lighter and thinner than this.
customer_reviews.author: Worawut Keesukpunt

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard works perfect. Can't wait for this school semester to start so I can put it to good use.
customer_reviews.author: sonia gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the full sized keyboard and the flip out feature is awesome and makes for a very sleek design for a case/keyboard. The only reason I gave it 4 starts is becausewhen the battery gets low the Bluetooth does not respond as well as when fully charged. Will update review soon.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Full-size keyboard works great
customer_reviews.text: I've never felt comfortable using the virtual keyboard on the iPad2 so this folding keyboard from Logitech comes in really handy. PROS --Full size, good response, feels natural when typing --Pairing via bluetooth is easy and reliable --I like the USB charging; no batteries needed --Auto wake on and off --Integrated stand lets you adjust angle --Attractive looking CONS --Does add considerable weight and heft I use this to write long emails and notes and I couldn't be happier to have this. It's the perfect companion for the iPad2, especially for short trips when you don't want to take a notebook with you. Essential for writers.
customer_reviews.author: LGM

customer_reviews.title: Nice, not durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this early in its release. I love the full-size keyboard, arrow keys, etc. The layout and function key selection is well thought out. As others have said, it really **slams** itself closed, and it does add bulk and weight to your Pad. The worst part is its lack of durability. Once the plastic connective tissue breaks inside the mechanism, the keyboard halves slip and slide around in the operating position. Now a couple of months and few meetings later, it still works, just uncomfortable. A bit pricey for such a delicate tool, and one without screen protection as part of the structure. Skip it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Heuer

customer_reviews.title: The best full-sized iPad keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard! When I first got my iPad I thought it would just be a consumption device. However, once I got this keyboard, it became a production device. I am able to do just about anything on my iPad now that I do on my desktop - I even wrote a 100k+ book entirely on my iPad using this keyboard. I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sammons

customer_reviews.title: The Full Size Portable Keyboard for the iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is new and very different than the other smaller sized Keyboard Case for the iPad. The advantage of the Keyoard Case is that the cover fits perfectily over you iPod which acts as a protector. The othernew keyboard is extremely bulky but when expanded, you would have a full sized key board. This keyboard is great for someone who always relying on using a full keyboard for taking notes, where the keyboad case is more for convenience and accessibility I have fat fingers so I prefer the large full size keyboard. Thant being said, ladies with smaller fingers may find the smaller keyboards much more friendly. Just my thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Nice item, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a friend for his ipad and he loves it, it works easily and makes typing a breeze when using the touch screen is too difficult or you have something lengthy to type. Folds up nice and compact and can travel with you and your ipad with very little hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Cybele A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great idea - Logitech should build a premium aluminum version
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice - The ipad feels a lot like a laptop now, though with a touchscreen ! The buttons are reachable. The keyboard itself is great. Sometimes i feel like i might break it while trying to get the ipad out - maybe i'll get over my fear in time. Does add some weight and bulk, but its worth it. Wish it was made of metal !
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Ipad not protected
customer_reviews.text: I've just read all the reviews and I'm surprised they're so good. I was horribly disappointed in the product. Yes, it opens and closes, and the keyboard is fairly large, but when it's closed, the iPad screen is without any protection. Nothing tells you that on the box or in the description, and I assumed that naturally there would be something covering the screen. I had to buy another case for it. It's also really expensive, in itself and compared to other keyboards out there -- keyboards which DO protect the screen. Finally the keyboard feel fragile to me, both the slightly wobbly keys and the mechanism that closes and opens it. I'm hoping I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

product_meta.title: Logitech Fold-Up Keyboard, Bluetooth Keyboard and Stand for iPad 2
product_meta.description:
FEATURES

Fold-Up Keyboard for iPad 2
Noteworthy Features • All-in-one wireless keyboard and stand for iPad 2 • On-the-go design folds down to compact tablet size • Opens to comfy full-size keyboard • Integrated stand positions iPad at ideal typing and writing angle • USB charging eliminates battery changes • Auto wake and sleep when keyboard opens and closes • Works with iPad Smart Covers 

Enlarge


Enlarge
Logitech Fold-Up Keyboard Fold-and-go full-size Bluetooth keyboard and stand for iPad 2 
Fold open and type. Fold closed and go. With this convenient fold-up keyboard and stand, you can type and take notes more comfortably from meeting to meeting, class to class, or wherever you go with your iPad 2. 

Images of iPad, keyboard and case are for demonstration purposes only. Actual product may vary slightly. iPad sold separately. 





Enlarge

Convenience unfolds

1. Folded keyboard rests securely under your iPad 2


Enlarge

2. Unfold instantly when you arrive at class or the meeting


Enlarge

3. Type and take notes at the ideal iPad angle



Enlarge

Roomy Bluetooth wireless keyboard
Folds together seamlessly into full-size keyboard Easier, more comfortable typing than on a small folio-style Bluetooth keyboard 
Enlarge

No battery hassles
It's easy to charge over USB connection to your iPad power adapter You never need to replace batteries 
Enlarge

Auto wake and sleep modes
Keyboard turns on and is ready to use the moment it's unfolded Turns itself off when folded to conserve internal battery power 



Enlarge

Smart Cover friendly
Works with your Smart Cover for extra protection and style wherever you take your iPad 2.


COMPATIBILITY

Package Contents
Keyboard
USB to micro USB charging cable
Soft travel case
User documentation 2-year limited hardware warranty Works with
iPad 2 
COMPARE
Which Logitech iPad Accessory Is Right For You?

If this sounds like you: We recommend You take your iPad everywhere and want to enjoy your music loud and clear while you simultaneously IM, tweet, and check Facebook at work, the quad or your partner's place. Tablet Speaker

It's the perfect clip-on travel speaker for your iPad—small enough to slip in your backpack or briefcase, full stereo sound, quick connection and long playtime from a rechargeable battery. You work and play on your iPad—checking emails, surfing the web, playing games—in your home office, at the kitchen table or in your hotel room when you hit the road for business or pleasure. Tablet Keyboard for iPad It's a portable workstation for your iPad with a compact wireless keyboard, tablet stand and carrying case so you can enjoy comfortable typing and laptop-like viewing around the house and away from home. 

You like to use your iPad all around the house, especially to entertain yourself with music while you cook and movies in bed. Speaker Stand for iPad

It's an all-in one stereo speaker, adjustable pedestal stand and charging station for your iPad that's easy to move all around the house. Your iPad lets you travel light, gets things done and stay connected—which is why you want to keep it protected when you're on the move. Keyboard Case for iPad2
It's an all-in-one protective aluminum travel case, compact Bluetooth wireless keyboard and stand—so you can go from email to Face Time in no time and take along your iPad without worries.

Your iPad lets you travel light, gets things done and stay connected—which is why you want to keep it protected when you're on the move. Wireless Speaker for iPad

It lets you listen to everything on your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch in full, rich stereo sound—wirelessly from across the room. You're constantly running from meeting to meeting or class to class with your iPad to write notes, emails and search the web. Fold-Up Keyboard for iPad2
It's a roomy full-size keyboard and built-in stand that folds flat to tablet size and folds open for comfortable typing everywhere you use your iPad2.

Auto on and off: Power-conserving keyboard automatically wakes up when unfolded and turns off when closed
Full-sized Bluetooth keyboard: More comfortable and easier than typing on small, folio-style wireless keyboards
Fold-up keyboard and stand for iPad 2: Compact fold-and-go design holds your iPad 2 at the ideal angle for typing and taking notes
USB charging: You never need to replace batteries
